import { Button, Stack } from '@mui/material' import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../assets/css/signUp.css' import UploadFileIcon from '@mui/icons-material/UploadFile' const SignUp = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState({ userName: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '', }) const { userName, email, password, password2 } = input const checkValidation = (e) => { if(password !== password2){ alert("password do not match") } setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) console.log(input) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { console.log(e.target.value, e) e.preventDefault() if (password !== password2) { alert('password do not match') } else { alert('pass') } } return (
